title: 1Bd/1ba apt - Centrally located, all the amenities (WiFi, gym)
description:
ATTN COOP STUDENTS - AVAILABLE AS OF APRIL 1st


Renovated 1 bedroom apartment in quiet residential building. Full kitchen & bathroom. Wireless internet, cable TV and Netflix. In-unit laundry.


Fully furnished (including linens and kitchen supplies) and rent includes all utilities.


Access to indoor/outdoor heated pools, gym, tennis, squash courts.


Parking included.


Apartment is on the ground floor but there is an elevator.


Close to parks, public transport, shopping, Montfort Hospital, CMHC/NRC/CSIS/CSE.


Available for 4 months minimum. Very suitable for coop students.


No smoking (since it's furnished we don't want smoking in the unit) and no pets as per condominium rules


(The pictures are a couple of years old as the current tenant has just given notice and I haven't had the opportunity to take new ones but it should look about the same).


-----


1 bedroom apartment on ground level in quiet residential building. Ideal for 1 or 2 guests but could be used by up to 3 or 4 guests but it would be tight as it's not a large apartment and would require using hide-a-bed.


Full kitchen with all the amenities (refrigerator, stove, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, kettle, tea pot, dishes, cutlery and pots and pans, etc) as well as in-unit washer / dryer.


The living room has a large flatscreen TV with cable and Netflix. A sofa-bed that can be used as a bed if more space is required. It also has a dining table large enough for 4 (we leave 2 chairs in the bedroom closet since most guests only need one or two chairs).


Unlimited high speed wireless internet (WIFI).


Full bathroom with shower / tub.


Bedroom with queen size bed and large walk-in closet as well as a large dresser.


The building is not very handicap friendly as there are no motorized doors but with someone holding the doors, a person in a wheelchair could access the space quite easily. There are no grab bars in the bathroom though.


There is one dedicated reserved parking spot as well as a visitor parking (with pass but only for up to 2 nights). It may be possible to get another parking spot for up to a week (depends on availability). There is also on quite a bit of on-street parking nearby. The reserved parking spot does have a 120V plug that can be used for block heater (It's probably possible to use to recharge an EV in an emergency but I don't believe the circuit is dedicated so it would not be suitable for every day charging).


----


There is a gym, indoor heated and outdoor heated pools and tennis, racket-ball and squash courts in the complex. The gym also has a basketball net in the racket-ball court. Some equipment is available for loan with a small deposit. The shower room in the pool / gym have a dry sauna. title: Roommate wanted for 2-bedroom apartment
description:
Looking for a roommate for my two-bedroom apartment on the 10th floor of an 18-floor building. I have outlined in red the room available. The lease is a 12-month lease starting April 1st OR May 1st 2020. I will be moving into it on April 1 so more pictures aren't available. Viewings will be done in April when I get the keys. No viewings until then.


Single occupancy; only looking for 1 person; no groups; no couples.


Rent is 797 a month; internet is split (~$50/each): total is about 850/month.


First and last month's rent due upfront. Credit AND background checks WILL be made.


- Utilities (Water, Heat, Electricity) included

- Internet is extra

- Balcony facing Hog's Back Falls

- Parking is available for $65 a month in the parking lot

- Nearby OC Transpo stops, McDonalds, Shoppers, etc.

- Walkable to Carleton

- Indoor and outdoor pool

- Tennis and Badminton court

- The room is unfurnished, however I will be buying furniture for the living room and common areas (couch, dining table, microwave, etc.)

- The apartment has 1.5 bathrooms so I have a half bathroom (toilet/sink), and we will share the shower in the main bathroom (water pressure in the shower is great btw)


About me: I'm a young adult finishing his Masters at Carleton University and working in the government/private sector. I am social, but I tend to work a lot so I don't party or stay out. I would prefer to find someone that is studious or quiet during the weekdays, but if you would like to socialize/get drinks, etc. on the weekend I'm always down! I'm a very outdoorsy person so you won't catch me lounging around much in the summer, but you're always welcome to come hiking, biking, etc. I'm a tidy person so I would hope that you are, too. If you use the kitchen/bathroom/whatever clean up your stuff when you're done.


Feel free to stalk my Facebook, IG, or LinkedIn. Or message me for more info :)

title: Room for rent (Female international student only)
description:
I have room for rent for an international female student in a townhouse condo with two bathrooms. Females only!!! That being said, I had to kick out a male student who did $3000.00 of damage to one of the rooms.


The room has been renovated and fully furnished with brand new carpet, Ikea bed, desk, lamp… There’s a washer and dryer in the house, two fridges so ample space to store your food.


This is a great area to live in. Bus stop is just a hot minute walk (86, 89, 111). Carleton U and Algonquin is 15-20 minutes. Ottawa U and downtown is roughly 20--30 minutes, depending on traffic.


The area is full of outdoor shopping malls (bestbuy, winners, wallmart, loblaws metro, farmboy, canadian tire, shoppers drug mart, dollarama, pubs, lots of pho, noodle, thai - too many to list, and Merivale mall. All this within 3-5 min by bus or can walk it in 20 minutes.. There is a mini strip mall across the street with a convenience store pub, pizza, Chinese restaurant etc.


What I am looking for is someone who cleans up after themselves i.e. if you can cook, you can definitely clean up after yourself. Not asking for much, just asking that you clean up after your mess. As well, keep the room tidy and clean, and bathroom after use. Just be respectful of the house and to everyone.


However, if you like to have friends over, or you’re in party mode, this is not the place for you. It's peaceful and quiet here, and thus far we want to keep that vibe going.

FYI... this is not an all girls house. I live here myself (male) in the basement and two extremely friendly adopted cats.


Room is $580 (all incl)

Available April 1st

First and last required

title: Homestay room with English teacher
description:
Hi. We have a homestay room available.. The room has a large window so it is sunny and bright. We have been hosting female international students in our home for over 16 years. We really enjoy hosting female students and helping them improve their English, learn about Canadian culture and learn about Ottawa. We also love to hear about your culture, family, and hobbies.

The bedroom is fully furnished (bed, bedding, end table, desk & chair, bookcase, closet, and dresser). There is a private bathroom for you to use (no other international student in the home at that time). It has a large tiled shower, vanity, toilet, mirror, and vanity. It is newly renovated. Also, there is a private living room with a couch.

Included in price: 3 meals (breakfast, lunch and dinner), wifi, access to the laundry room, air-conditioned house. Room and bathroom cleaning included.

I am an English teacher and work from home. I am available to help you adjust to life in Canada such as how to take the bus to school, set up a bank account, go shopping, etc. I can also help you improve your English conversation as that is also part of my job as a teacher. I have a five-bedroom home with two bathrooms. I have two teenaged children. We enjoy watching movies, shopping, playing games, sightseeing, reading, walking and much more!

I provide a meal plan of your choice. You can choose breakfast, lunch, and dinner or any combination you like. The price of room and board depends on the number of meals you would like prepared. If you would like all three meals, the room and board fee is $825. You can change the meal plan selection during your stay if you like.

We are located near Algonquin College, Iris bus station, IKEA Pinecrest Shopping Plaza, College Square Shopping Plaza, Carlingwood Shopping Mall, and Bayshore Shopping Centre. There is also a grocery store and lots of restaurants nearby. It is a quick ride downtown. Or a 3-minute bus ride to Algonquin College and the shopping at College Square.

Please feel free to email any questions you may have. We look forward to hearing from you.

title: Private room in Envie Student for sublet
description:
The apartment is called Envie Student. It is located at Little Italy. Looking for a male student under 25 years old to take over my sublet from May 3rd (2020) to August (2020). It is very suitable for students, especially taking either the school summer programs or other activities during spring/summer time.

The apartment is not allowed to raise pets. The room is furnished including a double bed, a long desk, an open closet, a tiny drawer and one private bathroom. The room has a fantastic view of Dow’s Lake. The kitchen, living room and in-suite washing machine and dryer are shared with three other roommates who are friendly.

There is a penthouse on top of the apartment where a good place to make friends. A coffee shop is on the ground floor where coffee and food are available. On the second floor where study rooms and gym are can meet the needs to study in groups or in person and exercise. There is also a free shuttle bus every Sunday to supermarket.

Unfortunately, the O-train (line 2) nearby will be closed for expansion of its line on May 2nd, 2020, but there will be temporary bus service when the O-train is under construction. There will be buses to Carleton University.

There will also have buses to Bayview station where you can take LRT (O-train line 1) to Parliament, Downtown and University of Ottawa, etc.

Both Carleton University and Bayview station (LRT O-train line 1) are about 1.5 km away from the apartment. Either walk or bus is a good option because the weather is pretty good from May to August. Once you get on the LRT at Bayview station, it’s about 15 minutes’ train to Downtown, University of Ottawa.

The unit is $990 per month including Wi-Fi, water, electricity and heating fee.

description:
**For girls only: I sublet my room from the first of May; total rent is 585$**


I am a French exchange student and leave after the Winter term ( end of April ). You can rent the room from 1st of may to end of august, and of course renew the lease afterwards.

The location of the house is perfect! It is right next to the UOttawa and it will take you 2 minutes to enter the campus. There is also Loblaws 7 minutes away and you will live right next to the Rideau Centre, Byward Market and close to downtown. There are also several Bus and O-Train stations 5 minutes away by walking.


Your room will be in the basement and it is completely furnished. There is a big bed with bedding, a closet and a cupboard and a desk. The room is not big, but there is enough space and it is quiet and cozy.


You will share the house with five other girls. The girls who stay are super nice roommates. In general the house is rather quiet and they respect if you have to study or just want to enjoy your "me-time".

There are 2 bathrooms and you will share yours with 2 other girls. There is also a living room and a kitchen with enough space for everyone and there is a washing machine and a dryer available for free. Currently we're having a cleaning schedule and it works perfectly.


The rent is 585$ in total, including wifi, water, electricity, garbage and everything else.


If you are interested, just message me. I am looking forward to show you the house :)
